name: The Drill
description: The weapon used to attack Ba Sing Se's wall.

name: Ice Shards
description: Deadly ice bended by waterbending masters.

name: Air Blasts
description: An offensive maneuver involving a direct pulse or jet of compressed air shot from the hands, feet, or mouth.

name: Massive Air Breath
description: Inhale a gigantic amount of air and exhale it in a deadly force.

name: Fire Kick
description: Create a fire blast from a kick.

name: Spirit Energy Cannon
description: Giant cannon fueld by the power of spirits.

name: Rock Slide
description: Rocks raining down from the mountains.

name: The Serpent
description: The serpent that dwells deep within the Serpent's Pass.
